name: Circle Tee Womens
description:
The Circle Tee is a simple, classic, clean logo tee made of the best materials.  

This shirt is made of 100% combed ringspun cotton jersey.  It is super soft to the touch and feels great. Soft, refined crew neck with added body length and a slim fit silhouette.

Think quality.

Raquel is 5'10" with a slim build and is wearing a medium.  If you're on the bubble, order up due to the slim fit and the cotton materials.

name: Circle Tee
description:
The Circle Tee is a simple, classic, clean logo tee made of the best materials.  

The shirt is made of 100% preshrunk combed ringspun cotton.  Not sure what that is, look it up, because that means it is super soft and has a great feel to it.  

Think quality.  

The cut of the shirt is a lightweight, slim fit so it doesn't look like you are wearing a trash bag with holes in it.  As with all "preshrunk" shirts, it's 100% cotton so plan on it shrinking a little bit when ordering.

Ryan is 6'2" weighs about two bills, and is wearing a large.

name: Old Reliable 1044 Artist Series
description:
Laguna College of Art and Design student Spencer McFaul laid down some beautiful art on this handplane.  The design is an original and looks awesome under the gloss coat.  Support young artists by buying this plane...40% of the price of the handplane goes to the artist.

If you have to just take one plane, take this one.  Perfect for anything.  You’ll get more barrels in two days with this plane than you would in two years with your shredsled.  Two deep concave channels to give control.

Plane: 11 ½ by 7
Strap Size: Medium
Wood: Poplar
Finish: Marine Grade Spar Varnish

name: Truth 1038T
description:
The Truth was made for the mushy days that we get so often in southern California.  Not your best bet for critical waves, but it'll increase your wave count for sure.  It's huge, so huge that you probably can't handle it...hence the name.  

Plane: 13 1/8 by 7
Strap Size: Large
Wood: Pine
Finish: Marine Grade Spar Varnish

name: Step Up Slim 1040SUS
description:
The Step Up is a bigger version of Old Reliable.    Great for softer waves that won't rip your arm off.  It's there when you need just a little bit more surface area.  This is my go-to plane for most days.  Two deep concave channels to give control.  The Slim has a little narrower tail than the standard Step Up.

Plane: 13 1/2 by just under 7
Strap Size: Medium/Large
Wood: Poplar
Finish: Marine Grade Spar Varnish

name: Weekend Whomper Old Reliable 11
description:
The Weekend Whomper offers a quality shape with a bargain price tag.  It gives you the chance to get some skin in the game without breaking the bank.  Simplified bottom contours with the classic Dutch outline and rails.  Select Pine finished with a mix of boiled linseed oil and turpentine to keep it fresh and sealed.

Strap Size: M

name: Tulip Too
description:
Tulip Too is a variation of our Tulip longboard.  It has a slightly narrower nose, midpoint that is moved back a couple inches, and a simplified bottom contour.  It has a slightly rolled bottom to a subtle vee with no nose concave.  Fifty-Fifty rails.

Simple, Beautiful, Fun.  Isn't that all we're looking for?

Impeccably glassed by The Waterman's Guild

9'4" x 23" x 3"

No Shipping.  Pickup or delivery only.

name: Ma's Worry
description:
Ma's Worry is named after an ancient skateboard that my old man made from disassembling an old roller skate and putting the wheels on the bottom of a scrap piece of lumber from his old man.  He painted "Ma's Worry" on it because his mom would always shudder at the idea of him careening down the hill in front of their house.  He also painted "409" on it, because The Beach Boys and big blocks never go out of style.

Well, I guess the apple doesn't fall far from the tree.  And my mom always lets me know how much she prays when she hears I'm going out in big waves.  This boards roots are in early Michigan hill bombing that has grown into California glide.

This mid-length is all about fun.  Slightly rolled bottom transitions to a little bit of vee and turned down rails in the back for a sweet release.  Reminiscent of those fun single fins we used to see more of.

Glassed impeccably at The Waterman's Guild.

8' x 21.75 x 3

No Shipping.  Pick up or drop off only.
